name: Glitch-Slapped
description:
Fight your way to save the princess from the evil ghosts

There is a glitchpocalypse that is here to ruin your day, survive the onslaught of ghosts, lightsabers, spikes and glitches. 

Every glitch will change the gameplay, everything is out of control, putting your reactions skills to the test!

Press SPACE BAR to Jump, LEFT and RIGHT or A and D to move and ENTER to shoot

This game is completely unfair... deal with it

You win through luck or otherworldly skill.

Made by:

Mantas Ruigys

Patrycja Poczkai
